Short Description:
Fraction is a financial technology company based in Vancouver, Canada, founded in 2018. It specializes in the mortgage lending and real estate tech sectors, offering the Fraction Mortgage®, a unique home equity access product. This product allows homeowners to access tax-free cash from their home equity without monthly payments, prepayment penalties, or age restrictions.

The Fraction Mortgage® enables homeowners to unlock up to 50% of their home equity for various purposes, such as debt reduction, income diversification, purchasing investment properties, funding businesses, or home renovations. Interest accrues but is settled upon the sale of the home or repayment, providing flexible terms and fixed rates. Fraction aims to serve a broad demographic by offering a straightforward process and knowledgeable support, distinguishing itself from traditional loans and reverse mortgages.

Innova Wealth Partners is a Canadian financial advisory and wealth management firm based in Ontario, serving clients in Sudbury, Barrie, and Toronto. The firm offers a comprehensive range of services, including investment management, insurance solutions, and financial planning, with a focus on building strong client relationships and providing financial education. Innova manages approximately $600 million in assets and serves around 1,000 households, boasting a 99% client retention rate.

The firm organizes its services into three main areas: Investments, Insurance, and Planning. In Investments, Innova provides tailored portfolio management, objective-based investing, and assistance with mortgages and lending. Its Insurance offerings include individual and group solutions, such as life, health, and disability coverage. The Planning services emphasize comprehensive financial strategies, including retirement and tax planning, aimed at maximizing clients' financial outcomes. Overall, Innova Wealth Partners positions itself as a trusted partner for individuals, families, and businesses seeking coordinated financial advice.

PHL Capital is a Canadian alternative mortgage lending and investment company based in Surrey, British Columbia. With over 18 years of experience, PHL has become a trusted leader in the alternative lending market, managing over $750 million in shareholder capital and providing more than $3 billion in financing to entrepreneurs, single-income families, and start-ups. The company operates with a team of approximately 35 employees and generates $7 million in revenue.

PHL Capital focuses on empowering financial success through transparent and reliable mortgage solutions. They offer a range of services, including Mortgage Investment Corporations (MICs), alternative lending solutions, rapid mortgage approvals, diverse property financing, and creative underwriting solutions. Their target customers include non-traditional borrowers, real estate investors, and mortgage brokers, all of whom benefit from PHL's flexible and personalized approach to lending. PHL is registered as a mortgage broker with the British Columbia Financial Services Authority.

Short Description:
Lending Loop is Canada's first regulated peer-to-peer (P2P) lending platform, based in Toronto, Ontario. Established in 2014 and operational since 2015, it connects individual and institutional investors with small and medium-sized businesses (SMBs) seeking financing. The platform facilitates loans ranging from $1,000 to $500,000, with terms between 3 to 60 months. Borrowers benefit from fast approvals, flexible repayment options, and competitive interest rates.

The company offers a P2P lending marketplace where investors can lend directly to eligible Canadian SMBs, earning average returns of 7.8%. Additionally, Lending Loop provides a Loop Banking Platform, which includes no-foreign-exchange-fee credit cards and free U.S. bank accounts to assist businesses in managing their finances. Since its inception, Lending Loop has lent over $90 million, supporting the growth of SMBs across Canada while ensuring secure transactions through regulated institutions.

MMV Financial is dedicated to providing timely and effective growth capital to emerging technology and life sciences companies throughout North America.

Short Description:
First West Capital is an investment firm based in Vancouver, established in 2010. It specialized in providing subordinated debt, mezzanine financing, and minority equity financing to support mid-market businesses across various industries in Canada, particularly in Ontario. The firm operated with a small team of fewer than 25 employees and generated annual revenues estimated between $1 million and $5 million.

Currently, First West Capital is focused on servicing its existing clients and supporting their ongoing financing needs. It is no longer taking on new clients or offering new financing products, following a strategic shift from its parent company, First West Credit Union. This credit union, formed in 2010 through the merger of several regional credit unions, is one of the largest in Canada, providing a wide range of financial services. First West Capital's legacy is closely tied to the extensive offerings and community presence of First West Credit Union.

SAFEBRIDGE Financial Group is a financial services company based in Toronto, Ontario. Founded in 2005 by Chris Karram and Elisseos Iriotakis, the company specializes in mortgage brokerage, insurance, and investment services. With a focus on providing integrated financial solutions, SAFEBRIDGE offers residential and commercial mortgage financing through over 60 lending partners, along with tailored insurance products and financial investment advisory services.

The company employs a unique approach called "Mortgage Centered Financial Planning," which positions mortgages at the core of a client's financial strategy, integrating them with insurance and investment services to help clients achieve their financial goals. SAFEBRIDGE has experienced significant growth, achieving over 40% year-over-year increases in mortgage volume and revenue. The company has also received several industry accolades, including nominations for community service and branding awards, and recognition as an Employer of Choice.

Short Description:
Introduction Capital is a Toronto-based boutique financial services firm established in 2004. The company specializes in precision capital introduction and alternative investment brokering. It operates as an exempt market dealer registered in several Canadian provinces, including British Columbia, Alberta, Manitoba, Ontario, Quebec, and Nova Scotia. The firm is led by CEO and Founder Karen Azlen and has a team of eight employees.

The core services of Introduction Capital include capital introduction services, where they connect sophisticated investors with alternative investment opportunities. They also provide Canadian dealer services, assisting international investment managers in raising capital in Canada. In 2024, the firm facilitated the placement of US $1.1 billion in distributions. Additionally, Introduction Capital has hosted the Canadian Alternative Investment Forum (CAIF) for over 13 years. The firm has introduced $300 million in capital and facilitated $5.1 billion in Canadian distributions, serving a client base that includes family offices, institutions, ultra-high-net-worth individuals, and international investment managers.

Short Description:
Essex Lease Financial Corporation (ELFC) is an equipment financing company based in Calgary, Alberta, established in 1986. It is recognized as one of Canada's leading independent financial partners for industrial businesses across Western and Central Canada. With nearly four decades of experience, ELFC focuses on providing personalized equipment financing solutions, emphasizing long-term relationships and responsive funding processes.

The company offers a range of financing options, including operating and capital leases, rental purchase options, asset-backed lines of credit, equipment refinancing, debt restructuring, and leaseback arrangements. ELFC also maintains a fleet of over 400 rental trailers and other assets to support transportation and construction needs. With a dedicated team of around 37 employees, ELFC serves thousands of customers, primarily in sectors that require heavy machinery. The company is poised for growth, with plans to expand its footprint through the acquisition of ATB Financial's Capital Asset Financing division in 2025.

Short Description:
WHO WE ARE?
Mortgage Bridge Canada is a leading edge independently owned and operated Canada's Mortgage Company. Experts from diversified background in financial planning, investments & real estate form the MBC team of mortgage agents and brokers. Since 2014, we have been prominently helping more than thousands of Canadians with suitable mortgage solutions.
We have over 40 mortgage agents working efficiently from a customer-focused, unparalleled service and solution-driven viewpoint exceeding all your financial needs. Our team first listens to your financial obligation and identifies the right mortgage solution thus advocating the benefits to all the stakeholders.
We provide mortgage services to a population spread across Toronto & in and around GTA area.

WHAT WE DO?
Mortgage Bridge Canada is a top-notch mortgage brokerage specializing in residential mortgages and Private financing. Our accredited mortgage professionals help source funds by meticulously bundling your documents for the mortgage. Whether you are investing in your first home, refinancing your current mortgage, switching your mortgage,  investing in real estate or consolidating debts, our experts will give you an unbiased and independent advice with our goal being to find the ideal solution and save your valuable time.
We provide you with an array of funding solutions including mortgage renewals, refinancing, second mortgages, home equity loans, bridge loans and other specialized mortgage products from 40 different financial institutions whether you are self-employed, operate a small business, own a home or a condo, new to Canada, professional or a corporate 
We are available 24*7 to have you believe that you can trust the process of application, paper work and right option and remind you of the good decision you made then. We are here to ease the process of life's most exciting endeavors of buying a home which can seem overwhelming to many of us.Our trusted team won't just find you a home mortgage, we'll find you the Right home mortgage that meets your unique needs.

With over 28 years experience in the mortgage industry, we are a one-stop solution for all your residential, commercial, and debt collection needs.

OUR MISSION:

Our goal at Maple Leaf Mortgages is to provide you with exceptional services by creating and tailoring a financial plan to fit your qualifications and needs.

DESCRIPTION:

Specializing in obtaining financing for your home purchases, refinancing, debt consolidation and other financial services, Maple Leaf Mortgages has access to many financial institutions and lenders throughout Canada.

We truly appreciate your referral business! Maple Leaf Mortgages is a leader in the mortgage industry.

Short Description:
Victoria Financial is a private mortgage lender that specializes in providing customized financing solutions for homeowners and investors. Established in 1986, the company has evolved from a mortgage broker in the San Gabriel Valley to a leader in competitive mortgage rates, serving clients in California and Montreal. Victoria Financial focuses on property equity rather than credit scores or income, making it accessible to those who may not qualify for traditional bank loans.

The company offers a variety of mortgage products, including first and second mortgages, debt consolidation financing, real estate investment loans, and home equity lines of credit. Loan amounts range from $10,000 to $1,000,000, with flexible repayment terms and minimal documentation requirements. Victoria Financial emphasizes quick approval, with loans typically approved within 24 hours and funds disbursed within a week. The application process is streamlined, allowing clients to receive tailored loan offers and complete financing efficiently.

Short Description:
REV Capital is a North American financial factoring and asset-based lending company based in Woodbridge, Ontario. Founded in 2017, it has grown into a full-service financial partner for small and medium-sized enterprises, operating seven offices across Canada and the United States. The company employs over 80 team members and has been recognized as one of Canada's Top Small and Medium Employers.

REV Capital specializes in full-service invoice factoring and cash flow financing solutions. Key features include no startup fees, monthly factoring amounts up to $10 million, and 24/7 online portal access for real-time transaction visibility. The company provides dedicated Client Relationship Managers, invoice management, credit underwriting, and collection services. REV Capital tailors its services to various industries, including staffing, transportation, manufacturing, and oil and gas, ensuring customized financial support for each business's unique needs.

Short Description:
Portfolio+ is a Canadian financial technology company that specializes in core banking platforms, open banking solutions, and cloud infrastructure services. Founded in 2020, the company aims to drive digital transformation in the financial services sector, serving banks, credit unions, and alternative lenders in Canada and the UK.

The company offers a range of products, including a modular core banking platform that supports various banking operations and flexible deployment options. Its open banking ecosystem, launched in 2022, facilitates the transition to open banking for neo banks and fintechs. Additionally, Portfolio+ provides cloud services with a focus on reliability and security, along with managed IT services, training, and consulting to support implementation and ongoing operations. The company collaborates with major cloud providers like AWS, Microsoft Azure, and Google Cloud, ensuring robust solutions for its clients.

Tristar Funding Corporation has been in business since 1984 servicing the Waterloo and Wellington regions. Tristar Funding has been part of the Mortgage Centre franchise system since 1991 and generates over 100 million funded mortgages annually.

  We have over 5,000 clients that continue to help us grow through their loyal referrals and repeat business. We are a well-respected business in both the Real Estate and Legal industry and invite you to ask your Real Estate Representative or Legal Council about The Mortgage Centre (Tristar Funding Corporation).

  We are located central to Kitchener / Waterloo and Cambridge and have Mortgage Consultants in each area to serve you better. With technology, office space is not a necessity, however, excellent representation from our Mortgage Agents is mandatory.
